item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, March 14, 2025 at 7:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Samsung bricked their home theater systems through automated firmware update (380 points | 292 comments)
2. The 2FA app that tells you when you get `314159` (2024) (116 points | 42 comments)
3. I'm Peter Roberts, immigration attorney who does work for YC and startups. AMA (112 points | 163 comments)
4. Block Diffusion: Interpolating Between Autoregressive and Diffusion Models (68 points | 15 comments)
5. Briar: Peer to Peer Encrypted Messaging (58 points | 24 comments)
6. Exo: Exocompilation for productive programming of hardware accelerators (6 points | 2 comments)
7. I-cant-believe-its-not-webusb: Hacking around lack of WebUSB support in Firefox (252 points | 208 comments)
8. Decrypting encrypted files from Akira ransomware using a bunch of GPUs (12 points | discuss)
9. Apparently magpies and crows are using “anti-bird spikes” to make nests (2023) (165 points | 59 comments)
10. Prequel (YC W21) Is Hiring a Strong Front End Engineer ( | hide)
11. Any insider takes on Yann LeCun's push against current architectures? (48 points | 35 comments)
12. My Scammer Girlfriend: Baiting a Romance Fraudster (323 points | 112 comments)
13. Show HN: CodeVideo – Two years in the making to build an event-sourced IDE (46 points | 16 comments)
14. Why do transit agencies keep falling for the hydrogen bus myth? (39 points | 46 comments)
15. The Cassowary Linear Arithmetic Constraint Solving Algorithm [pdf] (2002) (37 points | 10 comments)
16. Show HN: OCR Benchmark Focusing on Automation (3 points | discuss)
17. Stoicism's appeal to the rich and powerful (2019) (125 points | 199 comments)
18. Chrome for Android doesn't have extensions, but Edge now has a whole store (15 points | 6 comments)
19. Y Combinator urges the White House to support Europe's Digital Markets Act (436 points | 321 comments)
20. TinyKVM: Fast sandbox that runs on top of Varnish (290 points | 52 comments)
21. OpenAI asks White House for relief from state AI rules (725 points | 657 comments)
22. The Lost Art of Logarithms (507 points | 180 comments)
23. The Church FAQ (280 points | 145 comments)
24. “Normal” engineers are the key to great teams (534 points | 465 comments)
25. (Any) 8-hour time-restricted-eating window effective for weight loss (28 points | 18 comments)
26. AMD's Strix Halo – Under the Hood (125 points | 100 comments)
27. Apple's Siri Chief Calls AI Delays Ugly and Embarrassing, Promises Fixes (12 points | 8 comments)
28. You Can Make Postgres Scale (58 points | 46 comments)
29. In S3 simplicity is table stakes (123 points | 80 comments)
30. Show HN: Pi Labs – AI scoring and optimization tools for software engineers (11 points | discuss)
